[[Image:Bronzegate Pin.png|right|200px|thumb|A map showing the location of Bronzegate on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Bronzegate''' is a castle in [[the Stormlands]], the region controlled by [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]]. The castle is located north of Storm's End just off the [[Kingsroad]], southwest of [[Haystack Hall]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/storms-end/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Storm's End entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Bronzegate is the seat of House Buckler. It is located south-east of the Wendwater.
